content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

” Best quality with better service is our motto “

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Established in the year 1969, we “Holy Scientific” are among the leading and topmost manufacturer, supplier, dealer and exporter of best-in-class Lab Instruments & Crucible. We are an ISO 9001:2008 certified company. The industrial equipment range offered by us comprises Lab Instruments,Bomb Calorimeter Price, Metallurgical Lab Instruments and Textile Lab Instruments. Precisely engineered in compliance with the industry set norms and regulations, these products are known for their sturdy construction, high tensile strength, resistance to corrosion and longer functional life.

Interactively empower diverse imperatives after prospective convergence.

Managed by our mentor, Mr. Uday Parekh, we have attained a remarkable position in this domain within a short period of time. His experience, domain expertise and excellent management skills have helped us in attaining the trust of our valuable customers in an efficient manner.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
